name: Project A.D.E.
description:
It is designed as a story driven puzzle game, using elements similar to titles such as ICO and Little Nightmares. 

As part of the game's system, players can try to save the beloved one. Game play is presented in a 3D Side Scroller view.

DEVELOPED BY:

MENTAL PIPES

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 3, 2021/2022)

  • Alessandro Davini
  • Marco Elia

  • Manuel Charrier
  • Alessandro Cocchi
  • Federico Mele
  • Giovanni Zecchini

  • Nicholas Castellazzi
